hero.title: About Baitak
hero.tagline: Trusted help, just a tap away.
hero.subtitle: connecting homeowners with trusted service professionals.

intro.title: About Baitak
intro.paragraph1: Around here, finding good help usually starts with a message —
intro.paragraph2: Baitak makes it easier - a trusted place to find reliable, trained, and verified professionals for cleaning, maintenance, and repairs.
intro.paragraph3: Every provider is vetted through local partners, so you can hire with confidence.
intro.paragraph4: Because finding help shouldn't depend on luck.
intro.paragraph5: Built locally for everyday life, Baitak brings reliability home.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Baitak was born from a simple idea: making home services accessible, trustworthy, and convenient for everyone. We saw how difficult it was for homeowners to find reliable service providers, and how challenging it was for professionals to grow their businesses.
story.paragraph2: Founded in 2022, we've built a platform that connects thousands of customers with vetted service providers across Jordan. Our mission is to transform how people think about home services.
story.paragraph3: Today, Baitak is the leading home service marketplace in Jordan, helping customers find everything from cleaning to repairs, and supporting local professionals in growing their businesses.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make quality home services accessible to everyone, while supporting local professionals in building sustainable businesses.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted platform for home services in the Middle East, known for quality, reliability, and community impact.

customer_first.title: Customer First
customer_first.description: Every decision we make is driven by what's best for our customers and service providers.

trust_safety.title: Trust & Safety
trust_safety.description: We verify every service provider and ensure transparent reviews and ratings.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our platform to provide the best experience for everyone.

growth_together.title: Growth Together
growth_together.description: We believe in growing together with our community of customers and service providers.

ceo.bio: Visionary leader with 15+ years in tech and marketplace businesses.

coo.bio: Operations expert focused on scaling and community growth.

cto.bio: Tech innovator building the future of service marketplaces.

customer_success.bio: Dedicated to ensuring exceptional experiences for all users.

cta.title: Join the Baitak Community
cta.subtitle: Whether you need services or want to provide them, we're here for you.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: We're here to help! Reach out with questions, feedback, or support needs.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.message_placeholder: Tell us how we can help...
form.success_message: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error_message: Failed to send message. Please try again.

book_service.question: How do I book a service?
book_service.answer: Simply search for the service you need, browse providers, compare prices and ratings, then book directly through the platform. Payment is made after the service is completed.

verified_providers.question: Are all providers verified?
verified_providers.answer: Yes! All service providers on Baitak go through a verification process, including identity verification and background checks where applicable.

cancel_booking.question: Can I cancel a booking?
cancel_booking.answer: Yes, you can cancel bookings up to 24 hours before the scheduled service time at no charge. Check our cancellation policy for details.

become_provider.question: How do I become a service provider?
become_provider.answer: Click on 'Become a Provider' in the navigation menu, fill out the registration form, and our team will review your application within 24-48 hours.

payment_security.question: Is payment secure?
payment_security.answer: Absolutely! We use secure payment processing and you only pay after the service is completed to your satisfaction.

pricing.question: How are prices determined?
pricing.answer: Service providers set their own prices based on market rates and their experience. You can compare prices from multiple providers before booking.

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.subtitle: We're always happy to help. Reach out to us through any of the methods above.
